Arguably one of the best one bedroom available at this price in Prime Astoria. Be the first to see this brand new gut renovated 1 bedroom in a classic Pre-war building with impressive lobby and elevator!! This apartment features all the pre-war detail that is sought after with the benefit of a complete gut renovation with a modern layout: best of both worlds. The apartment has a brilliantly executed modern kitchen with brand new appliances and kitchen island for entertaining, large living room with seperate dining/office alcove, a GIANT bedroom w/ 3 closets that easily fits a California King and desk comfortably, and windowed bathroom with classic tub. Amazing floor plan with entry foyer that will separate your floor plan from all of your friend's "cookie cutter" layouts. Original herringbone hardwood floors throughout. The location cannot be beat. This is literally a 5 minute walk to the N,W train and just a 12 minute elevated track line to Midtown Manhattan. For the neighborhood, you're right in the middle of PRIME Astoria and dead between 30th Avenue and Broadway which literally puts you in the middle of it all. Building has a Live-in Super. Welcome to the brand new development sitting on 31st avenue. This Boutique Luxury building offers plenty! From heated floor throughout the unit all the way to Beko Appliances and every units has their own private balcony. Apartments start from the 2nd floor and work their way up to the 6th floor of the elevator building. The building also includes a roof deck with breathtaking views of the Manhattan and LIC Skyline.

About the unit: The entire apartment is tiled and has heated floors. Floor to ceiling windows in the living room and bedroom. The kitchen has a quartz counter top and a solid quarts back splash giving it that luxury feel. Maytag microwave and stove. The fridge and dishwasher are Beko. The bedroom can easily fit a king sized bed and plenty of closet space. The air units are installed at the top of the wall so you can utilize all 4 walls. The bathroom all marbled tiled as well and has sliding glass shower doors. This entire building is very well insulated and does have noise canceling windows.
